A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was Rian's \"screw you\" to JJ Abrams... He essentially undid everything that was previously set up in the Force Awakens. Where The Force Awakens was the perfect reboot to help us forget about the prequels\, The Last Jedi is a big middle finger to every Star Wars fan. As a standalone movie\, it was great\, but it was NOT a Star Wars movie.
